name: Pyrite's Plunder
description:
You are a pirate out for gold.

Shoot the white sailed ships and they may drop power-ups or gold, but be careful some are your enemies in disguise and will attack if you shoot at them. 

Controls:

WASD to steer the ship

Point and click to shoot

Over time the game will increase in difficulty.

Get a high score?

Post it in the comments!
